Title: Sojourn
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Joshua Green, Joshua Green (executive story editor), Asha Michelle Wilson (staff writer)
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Adina Porter, Billie Lourd
Plot: Michael grows desperate when his witch allies are slaughtered and enlists the help of unlikely allies in his quest to start the apocalypse.
